function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Improper hand washing leading to transmission of SARS-CoV-2","Impact":"Increased risk of infection and spread of the virus","Mitigation":"Proper hand washing and use of hand disinfectant","Technologies":"Soap, water, alcohol-based hand disinfectant","People":"General public, healthcare workers, caregivers","Owner":"Individuals, healthcare facilities, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Close contact with individuals suffering from acute respiratory infections","Impact":"Risk of contracting respiratory infections, including SARS-CoV-2","Mitigation":"Maintaining a distance of at least one meter, especially when individuals cough or sneeze","Technologies":"N/A","People":"General public, healthcare workers, caregivers","Owner":"Individuals, healthcare facilities, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Touching of eyes, nose, mouth, and genitals with unwashed hands","Impact":"Potential transmission of SARS-CoV-2 and other pathogens","Mitigation":"Thorough hand washing and use of hand disinfectant","Technologies":"Soap, water, alcohol-based hand disinfectant","People":"General public, healthcare workers, caregivers","Owner":"Individuals, healthcare facilities, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Improper sneezing and coughing hygiene","Impact":"Risk of spreading respiratory infections, including SARS-CoV-2","Mitigation":"Covering mouth and nose when sneezing or coughing using the crease of the forearm","Technologies":"N/A","People":"General public, healthcare workers, caregivers","Owner":"Individuals, healthcare facilities, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Improper use of gloves","Impact":"Increased risk of contamination and transmission of SARS-CoV-2 and other pathogens","Mitigation":"Use of gloves that comply with safety standards, proper disposal of gloves after use","Technologies":"Disposable protective nitrile gloves","People":"Healthcare workers, caregivers, individuals in high-risk environments","Owner":"Individuals, healthcare facilities, public health authorities"}]}
